answers.answer: I am terribly sorry! Most OBs don't know thyroid. Many endos don't know thyroid, either. Find an endo in your area who specializes in thyroid, not diabetes.Yes, hypos can miscarry if they are not treated properly. I've read that in books, too. Mary J. Shomon wrote a good book about pregnancy and thyroid.Fatigue is common with pregnancy, but considering your hypo situation, your TSH, FT3/FT4 should be monitored closely. Find a good doctor and take care!I wish you all the best.:) Tamra
